title: Mahindra XUV 3XO receives over 50,000 bookings within 60 minutes, deliveries to start from May 26
description: Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd announced that its newly launched compact SUV, the XUV 3XO, received an impressive 50,000 bookings within the first hour of availability. The company expressed pride in the overwhelming response, highlighting that 27,000 bookings were made within the initial 10 minutes alone, showcasing significant enthusiasm for the new SUV.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
